name: solana-pairs-liquidity-mcp
description: MCP Server for real-time Solana blockchain liquidity and token pairs data. Provides access to trading pairs, liquidity pools, and DeFi analytics across major Solana DEXes including Raydium, Orca, and Jupiter.
author: Solana MCP Community

tools.name: get_solana_pairs
tools.description: Get real-time Solana trading pairs data from various DEXes

tools.name: get_pool_liquidity
tools.description: Get detailed liquidity information for a specific Solana pool

tools.name: find_token_pair
tools.description: Find trading pairs for specific tokens on Solana

tools.name: get_pool_stats
tools.description: Get comprehensive statistics and analysis for a Solana liquidity pool
